description_html: Part of Formica® Writable Surfaces collection is SketchTable™, a ready-made table for the home. SketchTable™ is offered in two sizes; 16-inch and 24-inch, perfect for playing games, doing homework and even labeling those delicious appetizers for your guests at your next cocktail party. The taller size makes a lovely accent piece for a front entryway where reminders can be left, for a child’s play or study table or even as a practical and enjoyable end table. Each table has a two-sided flip top, giving the chance to have two writable surfaces you can simply flip when your project or artistic mood changes. Two surface options are available. The first is the Formica® Writable Surface with the ColorBook design on the front and black ChalkAble design on the back. The second Formica® Writable Surface option is the LoveWords design on the front and black ChalkAble design on the back. Price: $150.
